comments: Washington (CHA) establishes himself in a legal picking position Alexander-Walker's (NOP) path and does not deliver any contact.
As Johnson's (NOP) hand briefly makes contact with Ball's (CHA) front, Ball grasps Johnson's arm and immediately releases.
Johnson (NOP) briefly places a hand to Ball's (CHA) front during the drive.
Alexander-Walker (NOP) makes contact with Ball's (CHA) arm before he enters his shooting motion.
Ball (CHA) makes clean contact with the ball.
Ball (CHA) makes contact with Ball's (NOP) lower body that impedes his progress during the loose ball.
Johnson (NOP) establishes himself in a legal picking position in Rozier's (CHA) path and does not deliver any contact.
Washington (CHA) is in a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact when Alexander-Walker (NOP) drives into him.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Alexander-Walker (NOP) naturally loses control of his dribble and is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds. Possession is correctly awarder to CHA.
Washington (CHA) places his hands on Bledsoe's (NOP) backside during the pick and as Washington releases from the pick, he makes marginal contact with Bledsoe.
Alexander-Walker (NOP) briefly places an arm around Zeller (CHA) as they engage during the pick.
Ball (NOP) makes marginal contact with Monk's (CHA) arm as he gathers.
Hayes (NOP) makes clean contact with the ball during Monk's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
As Zeller (CHA) absorbs the body contact, Washington (CHA) cleanly blocks Alexander-Walker's (NOP) driving shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) legally contests Ball's (NOP) jump shot attempt.
Replay review of the play confirms the on-court ruling of NOP ball.
Washington (CHA) makes hand on ball contact during Hayes' (NOP) shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) engages then disengages with Bledsoe (NOP) as they move off-ball.
Following the hand-off, Zeller (CHA) legally firms up in Bledsoe's (NOP) path.
Bledsoe (NOP) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Alexander-Walker (NOP).
